narrative.narrative: Officially called Trans Mediterranean Airways, it is shortend to TMA Cargo. It is based at Beirut,Lebanon and has had two lifes, it was around from 1953-2004 and then was reborn in 2010. As of December 2012 they flew to 8 Asian airports besides Beirut, and 3 in Europe and 3 in Africa. They had three 767-300ER's and an A300-600F. They have been known to have DC-4's and DC-6's in the 60's and 707's in the 70's and 80's too.
